document_name: Law 34/2007 on air quality and atmosphere protection, last amended by Law 11/2014
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ESP/2007/ESP-2007-11-15-Law 34_2007 on air quality and atmosphere protection, last amended by Law 11_2014_823643db82d48c518c15a7e784af0048.pdf
document_description:
This vehicle taxation Law sees official CO2 emissions accredited, as appropriate, by a certificate issued by the manufacturer or importer of the vehicle except where such issues appear on the technical inspection card or other official document issued individually to the vehicle in question.

The Law also requires information on fuel consumption and CO2 emissions.
